channel.title: Intellectual Property on Ex Machina
channel.description: Recent content in Intellectual Property on Ex Machina

item.title: Idea Factories
item.description: Over the course of my career, I have come across entrepreneurs of all hues. Some are bubbling with inspiration, constantly finding solutions to the problems around them. They have an almost inexhaustible supply of ideas and the energy and inclination to worry away at a problem till they’ve figured out how to solve it. They love to mend what’s broken in the world—the problems no one else has been able to solve.

item.title: The Remix Generation
item.description: We need to re-imagine our copyright laws to update it to the modern era. As new technologies democratise access to content and remove barriers between the artist and his audience we need to find new legal solutions for the remix generation.

item.title: The Artist and his Audience
item.description: Technology has democratised distribution of content allowing a more direct connection between artists and their audience. New amendments in India’s copyright laws have taken this even further ensuring that creative works are even more accessible than they have ever been.
